name: "Masters of the Night-Wind"
title: "Masters of the Night-Wind"
desc: A tribe renowned for its mastery of the arcane arts. It is said that in their domain, one can listen to the echoes of the silent kingdom of the night.

skills.desc:
This card begins with 4 Spiritspeaking.
After you Select: Spiritspeaking -1.
At the start of the Action Phase: If Spiritspeaking is 0, this card is removed, and you can Select 1 of 3 random 2-cost Support Cards to be created.
